name: Rickety Bricks
description:
15 beautiful levels in this semi rythm based physics puzzle game. Stack enough rickety bricks on a floating platform to clear each level.  

NO SAVEGAME, NO EXTRA LIVES - PURE SKILL.

Controls

  • Left mouse button: Drop a brick
  • Right mouse button: rotate brick
  • Left arrow: rotate brick counter clockwise
  • Right arrow: rotate brick clockwise
  • P: Pause game

Credits

Graphics: David Egertz
Programming: Nils Stjernstrid & Mikael Rydmark
Music: Mikael Rydmark
